profileAlternative.name: Rob Morrissey
profileAlternative.headline: JavaScript Developer
profileAlternative.summary:
Programmer. JavaScript Developer. CSS veteran. From Adobe AEM to Node, React and Vue.

Some of the companies I have worked with include AKQA, LBi, R/GA, Razorfish, Karmarama, Imagination, Ford, Beats By Dre, Audi, Unilever, BT, Coke, Marks & Spencer, Volkswagen, Orange, Sky, Virgin, The Department for International Development, The Foreign Office, The Cabinet Office, The Ministry of Defence, Guys and St. Thomas' Hospital, The Times, The Times Online, The Sunday Times, BP Gas and Reuters - amongst many others!

given.text:
Rob is hand's down one of the most phenomenal freelance Interface Developers that I've ever had the pleasure to work with. From the very first minute he arrived to LBi he was engaged in the project adding value, acute problem solving skills and all around buzzing productivity. Rob goes above and beyond his role and should be looked to as the benchmark of what all freelance Interface Developers should strive to be. If I had pom poms I would shake them. He's truly one of a kind and I have absolutely no qualms about reccomending him... however be warned, I'm still trying to figure out how to get him on all of my projects so you can't have him just yet!
…
See more

Even on a short contract Rob's contribution was described as awesome by the client. I've known Rob since he was first thinking about entering the contract market, but this is the first time I've had the pleasure of working with him on a project. In this time I have seen his skill set grow even further; he is a true open standards developer who can work on full build projects right through from heavy javascript interfaces to complex php back ends. I've also been amazed at how many other super talented people he knows. This is in no small part down to his supremely approachable and affable nature; he is never too busy to take the time to talk knowledgeably about anything development or industry-related. Highly recommended and a great guy.
…
See more

Although only with us for a short period of time due to project requirements, I was very impressed with Rob's contribution to our team and his input to our projects was invaluable. Rob is very proactive and will seek thorough, well reasoned solutions to any challenge. Rob familiarised himself with our processes very easily, which is essential given the narrow timings in our projects. He also proved himself willing to go beyond the call of duty on a daily basis, in terms of both responsibilities and hours, and was a joy to work with. I'd love to work with Rob again as he is a very reliable and conscientious developer, as well as a very pleasant character to deal with.
…
See more

Rob worked for me as an Interface Developer creating XHTML, CSS, and JavaScript interfaces based on web standards, progresive enhancement and unobtrusive DOM scripting. He is fun and upbeat, yet professional. His broad knowledge of software development and experience of working with Designers, Systems Developers, Producers and members of the Account team gives him the ability to look at solutions from a number of different angles and altitudes. Rob is passionate, intelligent, considerate, and hard-working. I would have no hesitation in working with Rob again.
…
See more

Rob's a lateral and strategic thinker who's passionate about looking for solutions that do more than just fix the obvious. He's also resolutely inclined to strive for putting the best in, and getting the best out of every project - large or small.

received.text:
Andy has a passion for experience design, interface design and front-end development. He consistently delivers work of the highest standard, no matter how much pressured the project and environment.

He is strong promoter of good usability and accessibility. He provides excellent mentorship to team members of various disciplines, ensuring that the final product is always as good as it can possibly be. 

If you want fast and efficient, rock solid, accessible, cross browser code that you wont need to rewrite every six months, then I’d get in contact with Andy.

items: Beats By Dre - Show Your Color
Department for International Development - Joint Stabilisation Planning Framework
